夭.definition: (bound form) to die prematurely (also pr. [yao3]); (literary) (of vegetation) luxuriant

夭壽.definition: to die young; (Tw) (curse word) drop dead; go to hell; (literary) short life and long life

夭折.definition: to die young or prematurely; to come to a premature end; to be aborted prematurely
